room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard’s Quest: The Last Days of Charles Vane" by Port City Tour Co. & Escape Rooms in Beaufort (NC)
room_description:
One of the most hunted and feared captains during the Golden Age of Piracy, Charles Vane was a man of many secrets. From his obscure beginning as a destitute orphan to his desire to unseat the king in England and start a pirate republic in the Bahamas, Vane was intelligent as he was ruthless.
Hunted by the infamous Lt. Rhett, removed from command by “Calico” Jack Rackham, victim of a hurricane in which he was the only survivor, and refuser of the Royal Pardon, Vane was had a rare courage and an unshakeable vision for the future of piracy. And he owned an object that could bring down the British government and change the world. You and your crew are locked in a fort.
